props.name: The Deep Sleep
props.description: You open your eyes slowly, fighting against your body's will to go back to sleep. You are laying in what seems like a hospital bed - one of several identical beds lined up against the room's wall. There's a plain, four legged table standing in one of the room's corner. On it, there's a pile of colorful sweets.

props.name: A Narrow Corridor
props.description: This narrow corridor is typical of ships, who usually need to make efficent use of all avialble space. Memories come back to you slowly and hazily: You left Earth on this vessel. Why?...You shake your head, but the fog is yet to clear.

props.name: A Small Office
props.description: You enter a compact office-like room. A tall, thin man sits behind a table. When you walk in, he raises his eyes from the computer screen in front of him.

props.name: A Long Tunnel
props.description: The spaceship's exit hatch opens up to a subterranian tunnel, probably dug by Planet Nine's settlers in the very first days after landing. A few weak LEDs on the walls light the way forward.

props.name: Larry Clarke
props.description: A tall, thin man. His expression is blank and unreadable, but his dark eyes convey a sense of furious determinism.
